inclusion.criterion: premenopausal women over the age of 18 who have BV
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: positive for all Amsel criteria: Vaginal pH > 4.5, Positive amine test, > 20% clue cells on wet mount, Grayish-white adherent discharge
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: subject is willing to refrain from using any vaginal medications, douches or spermicides except for the metronidazole suppositories that are given to her for the duration of the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: subject is willing to use supplied non-lubricated condoms when sexually active. But not to have sexual intercourse within 48 hours of any Study Visit.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: subject to refrain from alcohol for 24 hours prior to the first 7 days of the metronidazole treatment and for 48 hours after completion of this treatment.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: enrollees for the healthy Group H in the study must be premenopausal and have not experienced any vaginitis in the past year.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: subject will be encouraged to have a full clinical examination, but if she declines, she must have a self-swab evaluation that is normal (no yeast, no clue cells, normal flora, no parabasal cells and no trichomonads) and will be retained in Group H if her Nugent score is 3 or less.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: subject must be willing to obtain daily samples and return monthly with the samples for a self-swab evaluation and a replenishment of the daily swab supplies.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: healthy women will continue for as long as they are willing up to 9 months.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: healthy women will be asked to use the supplied non-lubricated condoms, but will not be dropped from the study if they do not.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: must be using some form of contraception if sexually active.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: mixed vaginal infection at time of enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pregnancy, nursing or planning on getting pregnant
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: subject on anticoagulation therapy, lithium therapy or Antabuse therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: vaginal bleeding at time of enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: use of any vaginal antibiotics or antifungals in the previous 10 days, from enrollment.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: must not require treatment for an abnormal Pap smear or genital cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: must abstain from vaginal douching during enrolled period
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest in daily activities, which may indicate eligibility for the study. However, she also has some digestive issues recently, which could be a potential exclusion criterion.
